(Verse 1)

(Verse 2)

(Chorus) 
Oh, Quantum Chromodynamics, you got me feelin' so blue 
Tryin' to understand you, but it's hard to get it through 
Gluon exchange and asymptotic freedom too 
Oh, QCD, baby, I'm still learnin', ain't nothin' I can do 

(Bridge) 
Confinement and chiral symmetry breakin' my heart 
Lattice gauge theory, tryin' to play its part 
Perturbative expansions, they just don't add up right 
Oh, QCD, sweet darlin', shinin' with all your might 

(Chorus) 
Oh, Quantum Chromodynamics, you got me feelin' so blue 
Tryin' to understand you, but it's hard to get it through 
Gluon exchange and asymptotic freedom too 
Oh, QCD, baby, I'm still learnin', ain't nothin' I can do 

(Outro) 
So if you see me sittin', stare-in' into space 
Just know that I'm strugglin' with quantum time and place 
QCD, you got me under your spell, oh yeah 
Got my brain all tangled up, like a Mississippi bayou stream.assistant

Note: Asymptotic freedom refers to the phenomenon where quarks behave as if they are free at very small distances (or high energies), while confinement refers to how quarks are always bound together into hadrons (like protons and neutrons) due to the strong nuclear force.
